content: All statements regarding the Company's expected future financial position, results of operations, cash flows, financing plans, business strategies, products and services, competitive positions, growth opportunities, plans and objections â objectives of management for future operations, as well as statements that include words such as anticipate, if, believe, plan, estimate, expect, intend, may, could, should, will, and other similar expressions are forward-looking statements. If it's a facility already doing conventional IVF, we believe that's a little bit different dynamic in that we don't â we would envision the clinic continuing to treat how they treat today with conventional IVF, but incorporating INVOcell into their practice. We feel our building and scaling too, so the idea being that if, again if we can close â as we close an acquisition and maybe even a couple going into the following year with also Atlanta and Birmingham and Mexico continuing to ramp bringing on another couple of new INVOCenters, it all starts to add up quite quickly.
